title: Vintage Ballpark Postcards League Park, Crosley, Connie Mack, Dodger, ++++
author: Greenmonster

posts.post_title: Vintage Ballpark Postcards League Park, Crosley, Connie Mack, Dodger, ++++
posts.post_content:
The following ballpark postcards are available for sale.  Shipping $2.00, check, MO or PayPal (jsrna@aol.com).  All postcards are standard size and vintage.

Real Photo Postcard circa 1976 Anaheim Stadium - Sold
Chrome Postcard circa late 1960s Connie Mack Stadium - $8.00
Chrome Postcard circa late 1960s Dodger Stadium - $8.00
Prelinen Postcard circa 1920s Cleveland League Park - $50.00
Prelinen Postcard circa 1910 Swayne Field - $15.00
Linen Postcard circa 1945 Crosley Field - $20.00

Back scans are available, send request and email address.
